thread.section_title: eGlobal Digital Cameras Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eGlobal Digital Cameras Australia | eglobaldigitalcameras.com.au
thread.title: George Skoufris
thread.title_full: eGlobal Digital Cameras Australia reviewed by George Skoufris

author: George Skoufris
title: George Skoufris
text:
Very quick delivery on my sons phone, good quality very honest and reliable
I had to cancel another phone as they did not have in stock they gave me a refund straight away Good communication they answered every message very fast and keep me updated on my order very happy customer
I will shop again from eGlobal 100 percent happy.
Thank you for making my shopping easy and communicating with your customers.
Very happy and valued customer
